title: Perfectly Planned NYC Stay
seo_title: NYC Stay Hotel Package | Deals at The Frederick Hotel
excerpt: Booking direct has its perks. When you book directly with The Frederick Hotel, we’ll give you a $25 American Express Card for each night you stay with us,  up to $200 to spend around NYC, perfect for a meal on us or few drinks in the greatest city in the world.

perk_list: In addition to your $25 AMEX Card, other perks of The Frederick Hotel include:
